name: RGB(Revolutionary Galexy Bandit)
description:
Assignment 2 for my Uni class Experience Design

Controls -
Arrow keys to move
Ctrl(Control) to Fire
Space Bar to Cycle through alternate Colours

Sound is Valve's property, I Take no credit for composing the music in this game.

Incomplete features:
Didn't end up finishing the Boss Script, something wrong with spawning it.
The sound doesnt want to be heard for some odd reason, the triggers are there but the sounds just aren't playing. (simple explosion noises when you destroy an enemy)

Jordan Winton - s3432335
